Reviews.Title: Sorry that I have to send it back.
Reviews.Author: Nana "Joanne"
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful laptop, but I'm returning it because the Leap Motion doesn't work. I contacted LP customer support and they told me to recalibrate which didn't work.  I don't think I should have to jump through hoops to make it work.

Reviews.Title: Decent for casual usage
Reviews.Author: Larry E. Miller
Reviews.Content: An acceptable system for the casual, everyday ;user.  I would not recommend for gamers or power users needing fast processing for large files or graphics.  As a retired tech I'm not bothered greatly by the often slow mouse response and graphical sluggish refresh rate.I highly recommend the backlit keyboard... one of the main reasons for choosing this model.  I don't use the leap motion feature, nor do I spend more than 2% of the time in the Start environment... prefer Desktop mode.  Having a touch screen is another feature I personally don't make much use of at this time.  I still appreciate that the features are there if I decide to utilize them in the future.

Reviews.Title: Getting use to windows 8..
Reviews.Author: sheila martin
Reviews.Content: Love this HP with it's features.I am use to Windows 7,So i am learning Windows 8 and i have to say,I like 7 better.This is a very good computer that will do anything!

Reviews.Title: Like the things I have learned to do
Reviews.Author: RockL
Reviews.Content: Everything is so different from what I was able to do before. I might get to like it more after I get more accustomed to it

Reviews.Title: HP Envy 17-j160nr 17.3-Inch TouchSmart Laptop with Beats Audio and Leap...
Reviews.Author: Ronald Herring
Reviews.Content: I REALLY LIKE THIS LAPTOP, BUT THE PROBLEM I HAVE WITH IT IS IT CUT OFF ON ME WHILE I AM IN THE MIDDLE OF PLAYING A SONG THE WHOLE LAPTOP WILL FREEZE ON ME, IT WILL CUT OFF & RESTART ON IT OWN. WHEN I PLAY A GAME THE LAPTOP WILL LOAD THEN IT WILL SAY THE GAME CAN NOT START. I ONLY HAD THIS LAPTOP FOR A COUPLE OF MONTHS NOW & IT IS ACKING LIKE THIS. NEED TO BE LOOKED AT SO I CAN GIVE A BIGGER RATING.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: ViewSpotter
Reviews.Content: For the most part the fingerprint keeps tracks of my passwords. I seem to have trouble logging in to a secondary Facebook or email since it keeps stopping my typing and asking for me to use my fingerprint. the touchscreen works like a charm and no problems there! I actually prefer using touch since its faster and easier than the pad. there are a lot of times my internet gets cut off on this laptop even though all other devices stay logged in and continue working. ( I have used all different browsers). leap motion is fun but still not hard to get used to.  not much use for leap motion. the sound on this is completely beautiful. clear and crisp. overall feel is nice. and battery last enough. side note* I dislike windows 8 its quiet confusing and I much prefer windows 7 but overall ill live

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Amy Gunsaullus
Reviews.Content: Leap motion works great. Touch screen is a great plus although not used often. Overall this laptop is a works very efficiently and responses quickly. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: HP Envy 17-j160nr 17.3 inch TouchSmart Labtop
Reviews.Author: Leah Tulin
Reviews.Content: The HP Envy 17-j160nr is an amazing and great choice. It's fast, has no problems, has beautiful screen and picture. Works like a charm! I highly recommend it to anyone! Easy to use, user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Best Gift Ever
Reviews.Author: curlygirl61
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my hubby and he LOVES it!  He could not have been happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Already encountered problems
Reviews.Author: KARON HALE
Reviews.Content: Very nice laptop-looks real expensive!  Only problem is, that it evidently has a lot of ailments, from what I see reading reviews.  Mine has already encountered problems and has to be returned at my expense for repairs.  At about six weeks, the wireless card stopped working.  Wonder what will be next?  Love it, but right now, I'm back to using tablet.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-4200M DC 2.5 GHz
8 GB DDR3L SDRAM
1024 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen, Intel HD graphics 4600
4.5-hour battery life
ProductInfo.Name: HP Envy  17-j160nr 17.3-Inch TouchSmart Laptop with Beats Audio and Leap Motion
